claim: Leonardo da Vinci was an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci  (  -LSB- leoˈnardo di ˌsɛr ˈpjɛːro da  (  v  )  ˈvintʃi -RSB- ; 15 April 14522 May 1519  )  , more commonly Leonardo da Vinci or simply Leonardo , was an Italian polymath whose areas of interest included invention , painting , sculpting , architecture , science , music , mathematics , engineering , literature , anatomy , geology , astronomy , botany , writing , history , and cartography .

claim: Leonardo da Vinci was an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has been variously called the father of palaeontology , ichnology , and architecture , and is widely considered one of the greatest painters of all time .

claim: Leonardo da Vinci was an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Many historians and scholars regard Leonardo as the prime exemplar of the `` Universal Genius '' or `` Renaissance Man '' , an individual of `` unquenchable curiosity '' and `` feverishly inventive imagination '' .

claim: Leonardo da Vinci was an author.
